name: Desert Commando Battle
description:
After Successful completion of Rescue people from temple robots , Command center inform marines patrolling in Desert that our one of most important military base is occupied by remaining guard robots escape from temple war.
Those angry Robots destroyed many important assets(modern gunship helicopters and tanks) in air strike of their jet planes,Now they are planning to build their headquarters in that area, so this battle is very important for us we have no jet fighter in that area for any air strike on those angry robots.
But we are sending one soldier from special marines forces,this soldiers is master in combat strike and guerrilla warfare.
We have dropped some most advance weapons (like shotgun, AK47 , sniper )in battle field.
Now its your responsibility to use those weapons carefully and kill all those robots in this desert base , and rescue our people from prison.
Best of luck, and careful from those robots in tower checkposts .Realistic guns fire power.

This is time of revenge ,so move on frontline and defeat enemies.
Don't forget to Share your feedback so that we can train more our soldier to improve his war skill.
